content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-25.5, 20.0)
Consists of boiler (position -25.5, 20.0) and steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5)
- Boiler is currently not operational and not connected.
- Steam engine is also not connected and has no energy.

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -18.0, -49.0) and a furnace (position -18.0, -49.0)

### Iron plate mine at position(5.0, -73.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 5.0, -73.0) and a furnace (position 5.0, -73.0)

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of:
- Lab (position -17.5, 23.5) which is currently not receiving power.

### Offshore pump at position(-11.5, 26.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5) which is operational and connected to the fluid system.

### Assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position -21.5, 25.5) which is currently not receiving electricity.

### Pipe groups
Consists of multiple pipe groups at various positions:
- PipeGroup at position (-22.5, 14.5) is empty.
- PipeGroup at position (-14.5, 16.5) is empty.
- PipeGroup at position (-13.5, 17.5) is empty.
- PipeGroup at position (-12.5, 21.5) is full output with water.
- PipeGroup at position (-9.5, 21.5) is empty.
- PipeGroup at position (-6.5, 21.5) is empty.
- PipeGroup at position (-6.5, 23.5) is empty.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors with boiler and steam engine connection
- Ensure that the boiler and steam engine are properly connected to a power network and have the necessary input liquid to operate.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### IndexError with entity retrieval
- Check if the entity you are trying to access exists before attempting to retrieve it to avoid index errors.
